page.title: 01Fenton/Kettlethorpe/Hardwick
page.content: The villages of Fenton,Kettlethorpe & Hardwick lie approximately twelve miles North West of Lincoln in the relatively flat Trent valley. It is essentially a rural area with arable, livestock and poultry farming as its main industries. There are very few amenities,public transport is limited and as people have to travel out of the area for shopping, schooling and medical care, private vehicles are a necessity. However, a variety of mobile services visit the area. The church of St.Peter & St.Paul serves two parishes sharing a vicar with three other churches. It stands next to historic Kettlethorpe Hall and near to the Village Hall, centre for community activities. This is a peaceful area in which to live surrounded by pleasant countryside.
